Connect With Me

Interesting things to know about me

I've lived in the Midwest my whole life. I'm happily married and have the greatest dog in the whole wide world. His name is Lambeau and yes, you guessed it, I'm a huge Green Bay Packers fan. My wife and I travel to a new stadium every year, we like to call it Packers Nation Invasion. Go Pack Go!
